fixes.name: MUSH Delta Down Diff EUR
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR Result =
    SUMX(
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)',
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[MUSH Delta Down T GBP] *
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Date Sign]
    )
RETURN
    Result
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the row-level multiplication of [MUSH Delta Down T GBP] and [Date Sign] into a measure by aggregating the product across the table using SUMX. Both column references were transformed to the 'TableName'[Column] format.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation (via [Date Sign]) references Tableau parameters; per rules, any calculation that references parameters must be created as a measure.
